states.Description:
You are in a long corridor. The air is damp and cold; the floor and walls are bare stone.

Prison cells are set into the walls on the North and South sides. Dim torch-light enters through a grate in the ceiling. 

Your cell is South. The corridor extends East and West.

A figure lays slumped in this cell. The cell is dark and the door is locked.

Above the door is inscribed the number '451'.

commands.ReplyText:
There are a dozen cells on each wall that you can see. All are shut, save the one you came from.

After inspecting the cells closely, you notice a shadowy figure lays slumped in a cell along the north wall.
The figure does not respond to anything you say.
